actions.name: Well-Baked Body

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Fire-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Fire-Type attack.

Effect: The user takes no damage and is unaffected by the effects of the triggering attack. Then the user's DEF Stage is increased by +2 for 5 Activations.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Fire-Type attack.

Effect: The user takes no damage and is unaffected by the effects of the triggering attack. Then the user's DEF Stage is increased by +2 for 5 Activations.
